content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) storing coal.

### Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) that is refueled from the coal storage.

### Furnace at unknown position
Consists of a furnace with no ingredients to smelt, possibly connected to the drill.

### Inserter and Chest System at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of an inserter waiting for source items and a chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5) that is empty.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using drill but being out of fuel
- Ensure the drill is refueled before continuing mining.
- Monitor coal storage levels to avoid running out of fuel.

### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt.
- Monitor inventory levels to avoid running out of ingredients.

### Errors when using inserter but having no source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to insert.
- Monitor chest and inventory levels to avoid running out of source items.

### Errors when placing entities but having no required items in inventory
- Ensure the required items are in the inventory before attempting to place entities.
- Monitor inventory levels to avoid running out of required items.

### Errors when accessing chest but being empty
- Ensure the chest is not empty before attempting to access it.
- Monitor chest levels to avoid running out of items.

### Errors when using burner mining drill but not having one in inventory
- Ensure a burner mining drill is in the inventory before attempting to use one.
- Monitor inventory levels to avoid running out of burner mining drills.
